title: ZcrPrn Donut Cushion, Seat Pads, Portable Inflatable Donut Pillow Hemorrhoid Cushion for Tailbone Pain, Sciatica, Prostate, Bed Sores, Postpartum Pregnancy (Gray)
features: Product Included: You will receive 1 gray donut cushion, which can effectively relieve pressure on the coccyx and hips, relieve hemorrhoid pain, keep you comfortable when working, traveling and resting, and improve the quality of life.

High Quality Materials: This inflatable hemorrhoid cushion is made of high-quality materials with good wear resistance and pressure resistance, not easy to deform or damage, and easy to inflate and deflate. The cushion is lightweight and easy to carry, making it a close companion when traveling or going out.
Ergonomic Design: The inflatable seat cushion is ergonomically designed to provide you with maximum support and comfort to promote good posture and spinal health.
Relieve Fatigue: The donut cushion shape helps to evenly distribute weight, relieve pressure on the coccyx and pelvic area, and reduce discomfort and pain caused by long-term sitting.

Widely Used: Whether it is from the office to the car to the home, this donut cushion is perfect. The seat cushion is perfect for chairs, car seats, truck seats, wheelchairs, airplanes, and anywhere else you need to sit comfortably.
description: The coccyx cushion for tailbone painn is designed for long-term sitting, effectively dispersing pressure and relieving discomfort in the coccyx, waist and hips. It is designed for coccyx pain, hemorrhoid patients and sedentary people. The donut cushion is equipped with a convenient inflation port, which can be easily and quickly inflated and deflated. Its compact size is convenient for storage and transportation. The donut cushion is suitable for home use, adding comfort to your leisure time at home. In the office, it helps you relieve the discomfort caused by long-term sitting and improve work efficiency. In the car, it reduces fatigue when driving or riding. On the plane, it can be used as a travel pillow to make your journey more comfortable. Products include: 1 pcs grey donut cushion Please Note： Due to manual measurement, the size may have some error. Due to the difference of different monitors, there may be a slight colour difference.
